subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets got 40 points from Vince Carter, including a serendipitous dunk to send the game into overtime and rookie Josh Boone had a breakout performance by scoring a career-high 21 points.
snippet: The Nets got 40 points from Vince Carter, including a serendipitous dunk to send the game into overtime and rookie Josh Boone had a breakout performance by scoring a career-high 21 points.
